 byte[] sendCommand(java.lang.String addr, java.lang.String cmd, boolean resp)

Method Detail

sendCommand

byte[] sendCommand(java.lang.String addr,
                   java.lang.String cmd,
                   boolean resp)
Sends the given command to the sensor corresponding to the given IPv6 address, and retrieves the returned value, if any.

Parameters:
addr - the IPv6 address of the sensor
cmd - the command to be sent to the sensor
resp - if the border router have to wait for response
Returns:
an array of bytes corresponding to the hexadecimal value returned by the sensor, if any
